#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
   long long int n, a,b,next, c;
    cin>>a>>b;
   cin>>n;
   for ( c = 0 ; c < n ; c++ )
   {
      if ( c <= 1 )
         next = c;
      else
      {
         next = a+b;
         a=b;
        b= next;
      }

   }
    cout<<next<<endl;
   return 0;
}
